content: NetApp Inc   a data storage equipment maker  reported lower-than-expected quarterly revenue  hurt by weak demand for its storage products  and said it would cut about 12 percent of its workforce.
name: NetApp Inc
title: NetApp revenue misses estimates; to cut jobs

content: Feb 17 NetApp Inc  a data storage equipment maker  reported lower-than-expected quarterly revenue  hurt by weak demand for its storage products  and said it would cut about 12 percent of its workforce.
name: NetApp Inc
title: UPDATE 1-NetApp revenue misses estimates; to cut jobs

content: Feb 17 Data storage equipment maker NetApp Inc  reported a 10.6 percent fall in quarterly revenue due to weak demand for its storage products  and said it would cut its workforce by 12 pct.
name: NetApp Inc
title: REFILE-NetApp revenue falls 10.6 pct; to cut 12 pct jobs

content: Data storage equipment maker NetApp Inc  said it would buy SolidFire  a flash-storage systems maker  for $870 million in cash.
name: NetApp Inc
title: NetApp to buy flash storage maker SolidFire for $870 million

content: Dec 21 Data storage equipment maker NetApp Inc  said it would buy SolidFire  a flash-storage systems maker  for $870 million in cash.
name: NetApp Inc
title: NetApp to buy flash storage maker SolidFire for $870 mln

content: Nov 18 Data storage equipment maker NetApp Inc  reported a 6.4 percent fall in quarterly revenue  as demand for products in its core storage business fell.

name: NetApp Inc
title: NetApp results miss estimates; shares fall

name: NetApp Inc
title: UPDATE 1-NetApp results miss estimates; shares fall
